title: room share offered to young male 18-25
body:

i am seeking for a young guy 18-25 who is interested in a room share with one other young guy
sharing kitchen/bathroom etc zone 2 area close to tube buses shops must be easy going friendly drug free person
someone with a good sence of humour i am gay but prefer straight acting guys no camp queens
if you want to know more email me or text
